bug.author: mfassler
bug.summary: In python, create_window() has a "left" and "right" parameter. should be "left" and "top"?
bug.description: Describe the bug If I want to create_window() in a specific position, there are two parameters: "left" and "right". The "right" parameter seems to control the up-down position. Should this be renamed to "top"? (The behavior is correct, just the argname is confusing.) Desktop (please complete the following information): Ubuntu 16.04. Intel i5-8400, 32 GB ram. GeForce-GTX-1080

comments.comment: You are right. It should be top.
